languages.text: "В-виноват, Ваша Светлость, молю о щедроснисхождении! Языки знати мне не ведомы, а своей просторечью боюсь оскорбить ваш драгоценный слух!"

"M-my mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I beg your gracious condensention! I'm not versed in the languages of nobility, but neither do I wish to offend your gracious ear with my lowly nervacular!"
languages.original_text: "В-виноват, Ваша Светлость, молю о щедроснисхождении! Языки знати мне не ведомы, а своей просторечью боюсь оскорбить ваш драгоценный слух!"

traits.locale_text: "M-my bad, Your {mf|Lord|Ladyship}! I beg your gracious condensention! I'm not versed in the languages of nobility, but neither do I wish to offend your gracious ear with my lowly nervacular!"
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

traits.locale_text: "M-my bad, Your {mf|Lord|Ladyship}! I beg your gracious condensention! I'm not versed in the languages of nobility, but neither do I wish to offend your gracious ear with my lowly nervacular!"
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

traits.locale_text: "M-my bad, Your {mf|Lord|Ladyship}! I beg your gracious condensention! I'm not versed in the languages of nobility, but neither do I wish to offend your gracious ear with my lowly nervacular!"
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

traits.locale_text: "M-my bad, Your {mf|Lord|Ladyship}! I beg your gracious condensention! I'm not versed in the languages of nobility, but neither do I wish to offend your gracious ear with my lowly nervacular!"
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

traits.locale_text: "M-my mistake, Your {mf|Lord|Ladyship}! I beg your gracious condensention! I'm not versed in the languages of nobility, but neither do I wish to offend your gracious ear with my lowly nervacular!"
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

traits.locale_text: "M-my mistake, Your {mf|Lord|Ladyship}! I beg your gracious condensention! I'm not versed in the languages of nobility, but neither do I wish to offend your gracious ear with my lowly nervacular!"
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: “是、是我错了，大人！我恳求您的宽谅！我不懂贵族的切辞，但我也不敢用那些污言恶语冒犯您的耳朵！”
languages.original_text: "M-my mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I beg your gracious condensention! I'm not versed in the languages of nobility, but neither do I wish to offend your gracious ear with my lowly nervacular!"

traits.locale_text: “是、是我错了，大人！我恳求您的宽谅！我不会说贵族语言，但我不敢用那些低级的汇词冒犯您的耳朵！”
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: 「も、申し訳ございません！ 陛下！どうか、お許しください！私は貴族の言語は喋れませんが、下品な方言で貴方のお耳を汚したくありません！」
languages.original_text: "M-my mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I beg your gracious condensention! I'm not versed in the languages of nobility, but neither do I wish to offend your gracious ear with my lowly nervacular!"

traits.locale_text: 「も、申し訳ございません！ 陛下！どうか、お許しください！私は貴族の言語は喋れませんが、下品な方言で貴方のお耳を汚したくありません！」
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: «¡L-lo siento, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Le implodo perdón! No soy experto en las lenguas de la nobleza, ¡pero tampoco deseo ofender a su amable oído con mi humilde nervacular!».
languages.original_text: "M-my mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I beg your gracious condensention! I'm not versed in the languages of nobility, but neither do I wish to offend your gracious ear with my lowly nervacular!"

traits.locale_text: «¡L-lo siento, mi{mf|lord|ladyship}! ¡Le implodo perdón! No soy experto en las lenguas de la nobleza, ¡pero tampoco deseo ofender a su amable oído con mi humilde nervacular!».
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: "M-Mein Fehler, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Bitte gnädigst um Cordon! Ich beherrsche die Sprachen des Adels nicht, will aber Euer gütiges Ohr auch nicht mit meinem niederen Diaklecks beleidigen!"
languages.original_text: "M-my mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I beg your gracious condensention! I'm not versed in the languages of nobility, but neither do I wish to offend your gracious ear with my lowly nervacular!"

traits.locale_text: "M-Mein Fehler, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Bitte gnädigst um Cordon! Ich beherrsche die Sprachen des Adels nicht, will aber Euer gütiges Ohr auch nicht mit meinem niederen Diaklecks beleidigen!"
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: « E-excusez-moi, Votre Seigneurie ! Soyez {mf|indulgentieux|indulgentieuse} ! Je connais pas bien le langage des nobles, mais je veux pas non plus offenser vos gracieuses oreilles avec ma parlerie de manant ! »
languages.original_text: "M-my mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I beg your gracious condensention! I'm not versed in the languages of nobility, but neither do I wish to offend your gracious ear with my lowly nervacular!"

traits.locale_text: « E-Excusez-moi, Votre Seigneurie ! Soyez {mf|indulgentieux|indulgentieuse} ! Je connais pas bien le langage des nobles, mais je veux pas non plus offenser vos gracieuses oreilles avec ma parlerie de manant ! »
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: "A... Affedersiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Lütufkâr şafsiyetinizin mahremetine sığınırım! Asilzade kısmının dilinden pek anlamam ama narin kulağınızı âciz darağacımla tırmalamak da istemem!"
languages.original_text: "M-my mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I beg your gracious condensention! I'm not versed in the languages of nobility, but neither do I wish to offend your gracious ear with my lowly nervacular!"
